title: Xakameynta Waqtiga
author: Unknown
description: Buug ku saabsan sida loo maareeyo waqtiga si wax ku ool ah.

title: Mucjisada Aroortii
author: Hal Elrod
description: Buuggani wuxuu si cilmiyeysan uga hadlayaa sida aad subax walba ugu bilowdo ficillo dhiirrigelinaya, kaas oo kuu horseedi kara guulo weyn noloshaada.

title: Falsafadda Jiraalnimadu Waa Insaannimo
author: Jaan Bool Saartar
description: Buuggani wuxuu diiradda saarayaa falsafadda Jiraalnimada, isagoo sharraxaya muhiimadda nolosha insaanka iyo ka mid ahaanshaha bulshooyinka casriga ah.

title: 50 Talooyin Caafimaad Ah
author: Ibnu Qayyim Al-Jawziyah
description: Buuggan wuxuu ka kooban yahay 50 talo caafimaad oo muhiim ah oo laga soo xigtay taariikhda Ibnu Qayyim Al-Jawziyah, kuwaas oo faa'iido weyn u leh caafimaadka qofka.

title: Arimaha ka Taagan Soomaaliya Maxaa Xal u ah?
author: Sheekh Dr. Cuthmaan Macallim Maxamuud
description: Buuggan wuxuu ka hadlayaa mushkiladaha ka taagan Soomaaliya iyo sida loogu heli karo xal ku dhisan mabaadi'da Islaamka.

title: Hada Baro ChatGPT Prompts
author: Mahamed Yasin Mohamoud
description: Buuggan wuxuu ku bari doonaa sida loo isticmaalo ChatGPT prompts si ay kuu caawiso dhinacyo badan oo nolosha ah.

title: Casharo Nololeed: Xasuusihii Sheekh Cali Al-Dandaawi
author: Cabdi Jabbaar Dawla
description: Buuggan wuxuu ka kooban yahay casharo muhiim ah oo laga bartay nolosha Sheekh Cali Al-Dandaawi iyo waaya-aragnimadiisa.

title: 50 Talooyin Caafimaad Ah
author: Dr. Maxamed Warsame Jaamac
description: Buuggan wuxuu ka hadlayaa 50 talooyin caafimaad oo muhiim ah.

title: Aqoonta Islaamka
author: Sh. Maxamed Cabdi Umal
description: Buug ku saabsan aqoonta diinta Islaamka.

title: Xakameynta Waqtiga
author: Brian Tracy (Tarjumay: Nuurdeeq Cabdullaahi Xaashe)
description: Buuggani wuxuu si cilmiyeysan uga hadlayaa sida waqtiga loo maareeyo iyo habka looga hortago waxyaalaha waqtiga lumiyo. Waxaa laga tarjumay buugga Brian Tracy oo khabiir ku ah maaraynta waqtiga.
